course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Engineering Risk, Reliability and Decision
course.description: Advanced reliability methods in engineering decision; Bayesian methods, system reliability and design, risk analysis, probabilistic observational method, Markov and availability models, random field, large-scale system simulation, decision with multiple objectives.
course.prerequisites: CIVL 2160 or equivalent

reviews.author: FuckUST
reviews.title: only if you got Matlab/advanced stat/ machine learning background (蠢人千奇唔好reg)
reviews.comment_content:
我year 4 讀的
比另一個comment累死
話乜excel
讀到一半同我講之後用mablab
我以為用excel先讀哩個course架+唔想讀chem eia個啲on9嘢
又唔想project
所以reg左
唉 我add drop 要intern 所以冇睇啲note...... 如果唔係應該drop左
估唔到咁難
spring sem civil 其他選修真係太多狗屎垃圾
揀唔落手 最後讀左哩個......
本身以為excel啦
sem中突然叫我去學校個網 download matlab
但狗屎垃圾科大只比啲staff免費用matlab(not sure)
我用佢比個ust 網完全見唔到matlab
而且望過ust software條list  好似真係得staff可以用..
最後裝左crack版......

you are dead wrong
if you think this course is just advanced civl2160

唔是講笑 真係可以讀到傻左
但哩個course應該算nice
我睇唔明note(佢note勁on9 啲example就係比matlab code你
然後冇解的)
example本身已經少 啲example係可以做做下唔做= =

咁我去睇書
更加唔知做乜春
所以哩個course其實比起真正啲stat course 已經cut左好多
然後我明白點解啲人讀stat可以讀到傻左......
我依家真係好respect stat撚
civl 2160真係bb班級數

個人覺得內容難過曬civl ug 所有course
只係單純佢final手鬆
如果唔係我應該收左皮

讀之前睇下
Probability Concepts in Engineering Emphasis on Applications to Civil and Environmental Engineering
(好似civl 2160個本 但後面啲內容真係痴左線)

professor一開始同我講ug要過3先讀得
我感想係 最少過3.7先好讀

10個topic
我到依家仲有幾個topic唔明
Random Field到底乜春嘢嚟的
蠢人嘅悲哀...
reviews.comment_teaching:
走曬啲堂(唔係針對哩個course 我不嬲咩都走撚曬)
有時note 睇唔明 會睇下lecture video 點講
係幫到我的
不過stat對我哩個呃飯食又唔識coding嘅ug civil仔
實在太有難度
(我會覺得哩個course 應該係6字頭......
佢嘅難度超過其他civl 4字頭嘅選修course 幾個次元)

會示範excel點用
Matlab code

但兩個professor真係幾好人
感覺都好nice
email肯定會回
我有份功課唔記得左交 (一份hw 10%)
佢send email 話some people冇交功課 最遲幾日後交返比佢
reviews.comment_grading:
第一份好少少 真係用excel就ok
第二份 我完全唔識
去左睇example啲matlab code先做到 (我唔明的)
ppt 完全冇字解釋啲code......
不過我final前溫下書+睇lecture video 突然明左
第三份 我唔覺得你會用excel做到
第4份反而最簡單

好彩係得4份 如果唔係jump 都唔掂

正常嚟講一個course有難有易
當我見第一份功課都難難地
諗住之後會易少少
然後發現我咁諗真是on9仔嚟的

by the way
classmates你預大部分PHD 又CS高手 ( 拎A+個啲)

功課全部包尾
hw prof極鬆手 我明明做錯左都比90%我

final (openbook 好彩只可以用excel 如果要用matlab真係食得屎)

T/F
3大題 有一題明送 (你睇得明exmaple應該識做)
B+ (少人嘅course 而且 pg level 自然比較靚龜)
reviews.comment_workload:
雖然得4份assignments同final
但啲assignments 冇source的 (而且都幾有難度)
然後其他master/phd student get full
你就含柒

Except you got Matlab/ advanced stat/ machine learning background

reviews.author: Evanllll
reviews.comment_content:
many euqations from class not PPT, even though we have record, better to listen.
Use a lot of Excel knowledge include exam and hw
reviews.comment_teaching: not talk about all of content from PPT but most contents will include.
reviews.comment_grading:
10% Class participation
40% Assignments
50% Final examination
don't have any feedback, and don't know average grade. I got B or B+ or A don't remember.
Final exam doesn't have enough time to do.
reviews.comment_workload:
4 HW
most HW you can find steps from PPT and some questions you can find from book but no steps.
a little difficult for some questions
